articles.title: Battlefield 6 Battle Royale Mode Gets Official Details; Testing Starts This Week on BF Labs - Wccftech

articles.content: A few hours ago, the Battlefield 6 development team unveiled the long-rumored (and recently leaked) Battle Royale mode, which will begin testing this week via the Battlefield Labs platform. The goal … [+3495 chars]
